name: World Congress On Cancer Research And Therapy
content: Conference Mind welcome all the participants from everywhere the globe to attend “World Congress on Cancer Research and Therapy’’ which schedule during June 25-26, 2020 at Osaka, Japan. This conference runs with the theme “Innovations and Novel Approaches in the field of Cancer Research and Therapy”. We are beaming to invite all the prominent researchers, delegates, students and professors to take part in this forthcoming conference to witness precious scientific discussions and contribute to the future reformation in the field of Cancer. Cancer 2020 Conference will focus on the educational research toward its influence on clinical outcomes, through poster and oral presentations, educational workshop sessions, and significant plenary presentations. This conference is a perfect podium to find out how cancer research advances obliging to the Medical, Health and human society. Conference will primarily emphasis on the current issues during presentations of the two-day event, which reflect current education, research, developments and innovations internationally in the field of cancer, oncology and medical sectors.
